truth: -  "In a balanced chemical equation, the number of atoms for each element is the same on both the reactant and product sides."
fiction: -  "In a balanced chemical equation, the number of atoms for each element is different on the reactant and product sides."

truth: -  "Stoichiometry is the calculation of quantities in chemical reactions."
fiction: -  "Stoichiometry is the calculation of temperatures in chemical reactions."

truth: -  "The law of conservation of mass states that matter cannot be created or destroyed in an isolated system."
fiction: -  "The law of conservation of mass states that matter can be created or destroyed in an isolated system."

truth: -  "A mole is a unit in chemistry that represents 6.022 x 10^23 particles of a substance."
fiction: -  "A mole is a unit in chemistry that represents 6.022 x 10^23 kilograms of a substance."

truth: -  "In a chemical reaction, reactants are transformed into products."
fiction: -  "In a chemical reaction, reactants are transformed into light."

truth: -  "An exothermic reaction is a chemical reaction that releases energy by light or heat."
fiction: -  "An exothermic reaction is a chemical reaction that absorbs energy by light or heat."

truth: -  "The coefficients in a balanced chemical equation represent the ratio in which the reactants react and the products form."
fiction: -  "The coefficients in a balanced chemical equation represent the temperature at which the reactants react and the products form."

truth: -  "A limiting reactant is the substance that is completely consumed when the chemical reaction is complete."
fiction: -  "A limiting reactant is the substance that is completely produced when the chemical reaction is complete."

truth: -  "The products of a chemical reaction are the substances that are formed during the reaction."
fiction: -  "The products of a chemical reaction are the substances that disappear during the reaction."

truth: -  "In a chemical reaction, the mass of the products is equal to the mass of the reactants."
fiction: -  "In a chemical reaction, the mass of the products is double the mass of the reactants."

truth: -  "A catalyst is a substance that speeds up a chemical reaction but is not consumed in the reaction."
fiction: -  "A catalyst is a substance that slows down a chemical reaction and is consumed in the reaction."

truth: -  "An endothermic reaction is a chemical reaction that absorbs heat from its surroundings."
fiction: -  "An endothermic reaction is a chemical reaction that releases heat into its surroundings."

truth: -  "A balanced chemical equation must obey the law of conservation of mass."
fiction: -  "A balanced chemical equation must obey the law of conservation of energy."

truth: -  "In stoichiometry, a balanced chemical equation is necessary to calculate the amount of reactants needed or products formed."
fiction: -  "In stoichiometry, a balanced chemical equation is necessary to calculate the color of reactants needed or products formed."

truth: -  "A chemical reaction is represented by a chemical equation with reactants on the left and products on the right."
fiction: -  "A chemical reaction is represented by a chemical equation with reactants on the top and products on the bottom."

truth: -  "In a chemical reaction, a single replacement reaction involves one element being displaced from a compound by another element."
fiction: -  "In a chemical reaction, a single replacement reaction involves one element being duplicated in a compound by another element."

truth: -  "A precipitation reaction is a type of chemical reaction where two soluble salts in aqueous solution combine to form an insoluble salt."
fiction: -  "A precipitation reaction is a type of chemical reaction where two soluble salts in aqueous solution combine to form a gas."

truth: -  "In a redox reaction, one species is reduced (gains electrons) while another is oxidized (loses electrons)."
fiction: -  "In a redox reaction, one species is reduced (loses protons) while another is oxidized (gains protons)."

truth: -  "In a chemical reaction, the reactants are the substances that undergo change."
fiction: -  "In a chemical reaction, the reactants are the substances that remain unchanged."

truth: -  "A balanced chemical equation ensures that the law of conservation of mass is obeyed."
fiction: -  "A balanced chemical equation ensures that the law of conservation of energy is disobeyed."

truth: -  "In a combustion reaction, a substance reacts with oxygen to produce heat and light."
